A platform cartracer based on Rayman 2, Rayman M is a fun racing/battle game that can provide hours of entertainment and challenge. This was actually the first game I ever bought and as a six/seven year old I got months, maybe even a year's worth of fun out of it.

What do you think happened? I’ve already got a refund.
